thread.title: BRIEF-Holy Stone Healthcare to issue new shares at T$15 per share for working capital supplement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Holy Stone Healthcare to issue new shares at T$15 per share for working capital supplement

organizations.name: reuters) - holy stone healthcare co ltd

text:
Feb 2 (Reuters) - Holy Stone Healthcare Co Ltd :
* Says it plans to issue 7 million new shares at T$15 per share for working capital supplement
* 10 percent of the new shares to be offered to the coâ€™s employees and 90 percent to be offered to the existing shareholders
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/9ZBbsF
